ingredients.ingredient: 2 ounces finely diced, thickly sliced deli Margherita® Genoa or Hard Salami*
¼ cup drained, finely chopped sun-dried tomatoes (packed in oil)
¼ cup finely diced smoked provolone or smoked Gouda cheese
2 tablespoons finely chopped pitted calamata olives
2 tablespoons chopped fresh basil or Italian parsley

cookingTips: Slice baguette on an angle for maximum surface area and easier eating
Toast bread lightly before topping to prevent sogginess
Mince all toppings finely so they adhere well and create balanced bites
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How do I assemble bruschetta toppings that stay put and deliver consistent flavor in each bite?
